content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2022/11/arcanoweave-part-7 html this pattern is available in english and is written using u s terminology if you have already purchased the pdf this update is available for free in your pattern library this is part 7 of the arcanoweave doily the pattern continues where part 6 left off starting on round 97 and ending with round 117 the finished size measures about 40 in diameter **here are links to the previous sections** * part 1 arcane aura 1 * part 2 incanter s insight 2 * part 3 evocation 3 * part 4 innervision 4 * part 5 terrace of the magi 5 * part 6 ethereal energy 6 **materials needed** size 10 crochet thread- for part 7- 1100-1200 yards for the entire doily- 3200-3400 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches used in this section** * shell * 3-fpdc popcorn * small fppufff st * picot * bptr * 2-fpdc cluster * triple picot 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ethereal-energy
